extension_description.message: Professional Google Meet caption tool with real-time translation, AI summary, and Google Drive sync. Boost meeting efficiency!

sync_notification_no_data_title.description: Notification title when there's no data to sync

sync_notification_no_data_description.message: No meeting records to sync today
sync_notification_no_data_description.description: Notification description when there's no data to sync

sync_notification_success_title.description: Notification title when sync is successful

sync_notification_success_description.message: Successfully synced $COUNT$ meeting records to Google Drive
sync_notification_success_description.description: Notification description when sync is successful

sync_notification_failed_description.message: Unable to sync meeting records to Google Drive. This may be due to network issues or lack of authorization. Please try manual sync later

sync_notification_error_title.description: Notification title when sync encounters an error

sync_notification_error_description.description: Notification description when sync encounters an error

sync_notification_get_data_failed_title.description: Notification title when getting data fails

sync_notification_get_data_failed_descri.message: Unable to retrieve meeting record data. Please try manual sync later
sync_notification_get_data_failed_descri.description: Notification description when getting data fails

auto_sync_on_meeting_end.description: Label for auto-sync on meeting end setting

auto_sync_on_meeting_end_desc.message: Automatically backup when you leave a Google Meet call
auto_sync_on_meeting_end_desc.description: Description for auto-sync on meeting end setting

auto_sync_on_startup.description: Label for auto-sync on browser startup setting

auto_sync_on_startup_desc.message: Automatically sync recent 5 days of chat history when browser starts
auto_sync_on_startup_desc.description: Description for auto-sync on browser startup setting
